support-tickets.title: Feature `download` doesn't work
support-tickets.description: The feature `download` in the main page of the website doesn't seems to work. The browser crashes after clicking the download button.

support-tickets.title: Website is unusable on mobile devices
support-tickets.description: When I open the website on a mobile device the layout is messed up.

support-tickets.title: Browser crashes after clicking the `download` button in the main page
support-tickets.description: When I click on the `download` button in the main page the bowser crashes.

support-tickets.title: Suggestion feedback for statistics page
support-tickets.description: It would be useful if the statistics page could incorporate a 3D chart for plotting the statistics values.
